name: place. fire.
description:
place. stones. fire. heat. cooking. food. fire. heat. washing. life. place.

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 

Our ancestor needed to learn to capture fire to a place. 
To heat, to eat, to wash, to live. 
For enabling us, the children of their children to live. 
To live now.
The climate changes.
We need to learn to live sustainably. 
We need to capture the fire before it captures us.
To live. 
To let the next generations to live.
